actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-92.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 137.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to establish the Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau, an advisory commission for the Kaloko-Honokohau National Park, and for other purposes.
short_title: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993

summary.text: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993 - Re-establishes the Na Hoa Pili O Kaloko-Honokohau (the Advisory Commission for Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park), in accordance with provisions of the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978.

titles.title: Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993
Na Hoa Pili Kaloko-Honokohau Re-establishment Act of 1993
A bill to amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to establish the Friends of Kaloko-Honokohau, an advisory commission for the Kaloko-Honokohau National Park, and for other purposes.
